name: Sated Fury
description: Allow your monstrous appetites to take hold, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 30 every 2 seconds, up to 10 times.  While toggled on, the Health cost of this ability increases by 200 per stack and you cannot be healed by anyone other than yourself.  When toggled off, you heal for 33% of the total Health cost you spent while active.
effectLines: Reduces the ramping Health cost and when you toggle the ability off, you heal for a portion of the Health cost you spent.
rawDescription:
Allow your monstrous appetites to take hold, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by <<1>> every <<2>>, up to |cffffff10|r times.

While toggled on, the Health cost of this ability increases by <<3>> per stack and you cannot be healed by anyone other than yourself.

When toggled off, you heal for <<4>> of the total Health cost you spent while active.
